postCreateCommand: curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && . $HOME/.local/bin/env && uv sync && uv run python -m ipykernel install --user --name=python3 --display-name='Python 3 (ipykernel)'
postStartCommand: nohup ~/start-desktop.sh > /tmp/desktop.log 2>&1 & nohup temporal server start-dev --ui-port 8080 > /tmp/temporal.log 2>&1 & sleep 5 && . $HOME/.cargo/env && cd /workspaces/edu-ai-workshop-mcp && nohup uv run python mcp_servers/weather.py > /tmp/mcp-server.log 2>&1 &
postAttachCommand: gh codespace ports visibility 5125:public -c $CODESPACE_NAME 2>/dev/null || true && gh codespace ports visibility 6080:public -c $CODESPACE_NAME 2>/dev/null || true
